actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department, Health and Human Services Department.

official_title: A bill to insure the payment in 1986 of cost-of-living increases under the Social Security Act without regard to the 3 percent threshold requirement.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides that there will be a cost-of-living increase in benefits under titles II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) and XVI (Supplemental Security Income) of the Social Security Act for 1986 without regard to whether the three percent threshold is met.

titles.title: A bill to insure the payment in 1986 of cost-of-living increases under the Social Security Act without regard to the 3 percent threshold requirement.
